name: psychic-memory
effect: Held: Changes Silvally to its Psychic form.  Changes Multi-Attack's type to Psychic.
short_effect: Held: Changes Silvally to its Psychic form.  Changes Multi-Attack's type to Psychic.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A memory disc that contains Psychic-type data.
It changes the type of the holder if held by
a certain species of Pokémon.
